author: RTÉ News
title: At a glance: Latest global developments
description: While the US Senate was approving the nation's largest-ever rescue package, across in Russia a decision was made to ground all international flights from tomorrow.
content:
While the US Senate was approving the nation's largest-ever rescue package, across in Russia a decision was made to ground all international flights from tomorrow.
Here are the latest global developments in the coronavirus crisis.
